David Bennett

Biologist - Bitcoiner - Texan

David Bennett is a biologist and host of the Bitcoin And... podcast.

David incorporates his love for Bitcoin, Permaculture, Gaming & Education as he discusses current events and developments in the Bitcoin ecosystem.

Join David as he explores the topics he knows and loves.
